prompt: Start a maintenance strategy development workflow for SAG Mill 001 at plant OCP-JFC. Walk me through milestone 1.
expected_output: Session initialized with UUID, milestone 1 (Hierarchy Decomposition) started, Reliability Agent delegated, hierarchy nodes and criticality assessments generated, validation run, gate summary presented with APPROVE/MODIFY/REJECT options

assertions.text: Gate summary shows entity counts for hierarchy_nodes and criticality_assessments
Gate summary includes validation results (errors, warnings, info)
Human approval prompt presented with APPROVE/MODIFY/REJECT

prompt: I want to modify milestone 2 - the failure mode FM-12 has incorrect capitalization. Re-run with this feedback.
expected_output: Gate transitions PRESENTED -> IN_PROGRESS, milestone re-runs with feedback included in instruction, new results presented

assertions.text: Gate status transitions from PRESENTED to IN_PROGRESS (modify)
Feedback about FM-12 capitalization included in re-run instruction
Updated gate summary presented for re-approval

prompt: Reject the current milestone - the hierarchy decomposition is fundamentally wrong and needs to start over
expected_output: Gate transitions to REJECTED, entire workflow stops, session state preserved

assertions.text: Workflow loop breaks - no further milestones executed

prompt: Show me the expected entity counts after milestone 3 approval for a SAG mill strategy
expected_output: After M3: hierarchy_nodes, criticality_assessments from M1; functions, functional_failures, failure_modes from M2; maintenance_tasks, work_packages from M3

assertions.text: Lists all entity types accumulated through milestones 1-3
Milestone 3 involves Reliability + Planning + Spare Parts agents
Materials assigned to REPLACE tasks via Spare Parts agent

prompt: Milestone 4 is complete. What safety rules apply to the SAP upload package?
expected_output: All outputs are DRAFT, never auto-submit to SAP, human must approve final package

assertions.text: NEVER auto-submit to SAP rule enforced
Human approval required before any SAP action
SAP package includes Maintenance Item + Task List + Work Plan
